article: when dodgers manager grady little announced early in spring training that shortstop rafael furcal would be the club 's leadoff hitter , and center fielder and career leadoff hitter juan pierre would bat second , little was quick to qualify that decree by saying that if it proved over time to be ineffective , he would change it .
abstract: pierre might find room at the top
